productEmsList.title: Handheld Version
productEmsList.tooltip: The Alpha 200i has inReach® technology capabilities including interactive SOS and two-way messaging.

productEmsList.title: Collars
productEmsList.tooltip: Alpha® TT  dog collars have tracking and training capabilities Alpha® T  collars track only.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: Garmin Alpha 200i handheld device makes tracking and training your dog’s simple, featuring a user friendly, six button design, preloaded TopoActive Europe mapping and inReach satellite communicator technology.
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: Garmin Alpha, Garmin Alpha 200i, Dog Tracker, Dog Training, GPS dog tracking
seoAttributes.title: Alpha® 200i

010-02230-52.productAvailability: Learn more about inReach satellite subscription plans

seo.ogDescription: Garmin Alpha 200i handheld device makes tracking and training your dog’s simple, featuring a user friendly, six button design, preloaded TopoActive Europe mapping and inReach satellite communicator technology.
seo.title: Garmin Alpha® 200i | GPS Dog Tracker

010-02230-52.shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

specs.Automatic routing (turn by turn routing: Yes (with optional mapping for detailed roads)
specs.Battery life: Up to 20 hours; up to 15 hours with inReach® technology enabled
specs.Dimension: 6.8 x 16.2 x 3.4 cm *dimensions do not include antenna
specs.Display Size: 4.7 W x 7.7 H cm; 3.5 inch diag (88.9 mm)
specs.Navigation Track Log: 20,000 points, 250 saved gpx tracks, 300 saved fit activities
specs.Range: TT 15/T 5, 14.5 kilometres; TT 15 mini/T 5 mini, 6.5 kilometres
specs.Satellite Imagery: Yes, direct to device (no annual subscription required)
specs.Tracks: Up to 20 assets (any combination of compatible dog devices and handhelds)
specs.Weight: 280 g with standard antenna and battery

inTheBoxTab.content:
• Alpha® 200i handheld with rechargeable lithium-ion battery pack
  • Belt clip
  • AC adapter
  • microUSB cable
  • Documentation
inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box

Yes (TopoActive)

inReach® Features
Interactive SOS
Send and receive text messages to SMS and email
Send and receive text messages to other inReach device
Exchange locations with other inReach device
Virtual keyboard for custom messaging
Send waypoints to MapShare during trip
Send route selection to MapShare during trip

Radio Features
Frequency bandVHF
Channels5
RangeTT 15/T 5, 14.5 kilometres; TT 15 mini/T 5 mini, 6.5 kilometres
Location reporting (send and receive GPS positions)
Vibration alert

Outdoor Applications

Garmin Explore website compatible
Dog tracking

Connections

seo.ogDescription: Garmin Alpha 200 handheld dog tracker, featuring a sunlight-readable 3.50″ capacitive touchscreen and user-friendly six-button design.
seo.title: Garmin Alpha® 200 | Handheld GPS Dog Tracker
